title: PREPARATION OF GLUE OR GELATINE
special_rules: The subject-matter disclosed in both the claims and the examples of a patent document is to be classified.
definition_statement: This place covers: Pre-treatment of collagen-containing raw materials for the manufacture of glue or gelatine from raw materials, e.g. by extracting or by heating. Stabilisation of solutions of glue or gelatine. Preparation of water-insoluble gelatine. Drying of glue or gelatine. Glue or gelatine products per se resulting from the above-mentioned methods, e.g. stabilized or granular gelatine, if no o ther group for the produced compound exists.

title: Pretreatment of collagen-containing raw materials for the manufacture of glue
definition_statement: This place covers: The preteatment of bones, hides, hoofs, or leather.

title: Isolation of glue or gelatine from raw materials, e.g. by extracting, by heating  (gelatine for foodstuffs A23J1/10)
definition_statement: This place covers: Isolation of glue or gelatine from raw materials, e.g. by extrating, by heating. Purification of solutions of gelatine.

title: Stabilisation of solutions of glue or gelatine
glossary_of_terms: GelatineA translucent, colourless, brittle (when dry), flavorless solid substance, derived from collagen obtained from various animal by-products
definition_statement: This place covers: Stabilisation of solutions containing glue or gelatine, e.g. by the addition of hydrocolloids. Improvement of gelling and setting properties of gelatine.

title: Preparation of water-insoluble gelatine
glossary_of_terms: GelatineA translucent, colourless, brittle (when dry), flavorless solid substance, derived from collagen obtained from various animal by-products
definition_statement: This place covers: The preparation of water-insoluble gelatine, e.g. by cross-linking (chemically, physically or enzymatically).

title: Drying of glue or gelatine
definition_statement: This place covers: Drying of glue or gelatine in the form of foils or granules, e.g. beads.

title: {Adhesives based on glue or gelatine}
glossary_of_terms: GelatineA translucent, colourless, brittle (when dry), flavorless solid substance, derived from collagen obtained from various animal by-products
definition_statement: This place covers: Adhesives based on gelatine or animal glue, including hot-melt adhesives, pressure sensitive adhesives and dry glues Adhesives based on animal protein hydrolysates.
